name: Taxi Forest
description:
Description:

Drive foxes to their destination to get time, money and score. But don't run out of time and fuel ! Every time you start a game, Fox City is a different place that you need to discover again. To make your driving life easier, enter shops to buy fuel and upgrade your vehicle. Some pickups can spawn on the road to give you extra nitrogen or fuel. Get the highest score possible !Stop your car next to a fox without hitting it to take it on board. A checkpoint will be added to your map, showing the location to drop it off. When you arrive, just stop the car in the green highlighted zone. To interact with shops, make a stop in the blue highlighted zone in front of them.

Controls (Keyboard | Controller):

Drive: ZQSD/WASD/Arrows | Left Stick Button
Camera : Mouse | Right Stick Button
Map : Tab | Y
Break : Shift | B
Nitro : Space | Triggers
Teleport to the last checkpoint : Enter | Select
Pause : Escape | Start

Team:

Louis Sommervogel: Programming / 3D Assets / UI Arts.

Pierre Thibault : Programming / Sound Effects / Music.

100% of the content in the game is original.
Made with Unreal Engine 5.1.
